benchmark_details.name: EconEvals
benchmark_details.overview: We develop benchmarks for LLM agents that act in, learn from, and strategize in unknown environments, derived from key economic decision-making tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To assess the capabilities and tendencies of LLM agents in economic decision-making tasks.

data.source: Synthetic environments created based on economic models.
data.size: 12 instances for each difficulty level (Basic, Medium, Hard)

methodology.calculation: Scores are calculated based on the performance of LLM agents on various tasks over multiple periods.
methodology.interpretation: Scores indicate the capability and tendencies of LLMs in economic settings.
methodology.validation: Tested across various LLMs with established measures.
